name: Elliott Advisors (UK) Limited
bossPosition: Assistant General Counsel, Senior EU & Compliance Counsel
goal: Elliott provides, among other things, investment advisory services. Elliott uses a global investment approach in a number areas including securities, commodities trading, fixed-income positions, performing debt, equity oriented positions, real estate, and portfolio protection.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: As part of a global organisation Elliott seeks to keep abreast of legislation which may affect its operations, or the operations of its affiliates. Legislation currently of interest to Elliott includes, but is not limited to directives, regulations, and legislation which may affect the financial services and energy sectors, as well as Elliottâ€™s other business interests.
